message.name: ERR_FV_SUBJECT_MANDATORY
message.locale: Subject must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_TIME_MANDATORY
message.locale: Start Time must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_END_TIME_MANDATORY
message.locale: End Time must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_ORGANIZED_BY_MANDATORY
message.locale: Meeting Organizer must be entered.
Meeting Organiser must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_MINUTED_BY_MANDATORY
message.locale: Minuted By must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_SENSITIVITY_MANDATORY
message.locale: Sensitivity must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_LOCATION_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Location must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUBJECT_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Subject must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_AGENDA_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Agenda must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FOLLOW_ON_DATE_TIME_NOT_GREATER_THAN_END_TIME
message.locale: The Follow On Meeting date and time, must be later than the end time of the meeting.

message.name: ERR_XEV_MINUTES_ALREADY_EXIST_FOR_ACTIVITY
message.locale: Error, cannot create meeting minutes as they already exist for this meeting.

message.name: YES
message.locale: Yes

message.name: NO
message.locale: No

message.name: ERR_PDF_GENERATION_UNEXPECTED_ERROR
message.locale: Meeting minutes cannot be generated due to an unexpected error. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_FORMAT_NOT_PRINTABLE
message.locale: The document cannot be printed as it is in an unexpected format. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_DATABASE_EXCEPTION_ON_PDF_GENERATION
message.locale: The document cannot be generated as there has been a database error. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND_EXCEPTION_ON_PDF_ISSUE
message.locale: The minutes cannot be written as there has been a file not found error. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_IO_EXCEPTION_ON_PDF_ISSUE
message.locale: The minutes cannot be written as there has been an IO error. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_EMAIL_ADDRESS_EXCEPTION_ON_PDF_ISSUE
message.locale: The minutes cannot be issued to %1s as there is a problem with their email address. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_MESSAGING_EXCEPTION_ON_PDF_ISSUE
message.locale: The minutes cannot be issued to %1s as there is a problem with their email address. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_EMAIL_FOR_USER
message.locale: The minutes cannot be issued to %1s as the email address provided for this user is invalid: %2s.

message.name: ERR_NO_EMAIL_SPECIFIED_FOR_USER
message.locale: The minutes cannot be issued to %1s as they do not have a valid email address.

message.name: ISSUE_MINUTES_SUBJECT
message.locale: Minutes for %1s held on %2s at %3s

message.name: ISSUE_MINUTES_SUBJECT_ALL_DAY
message.locale: Minutes for all day meeting %1s held on %2s

message.name: ISSUE_MINUTES_BODY
message.locale:
To %1s, 

Please see attached for meeting minutes for %2s held on %3s at %4s.

Sincerely,
%5s

message.name: ISSUE_MINUTES_BODY_ALL_DAY
message.locale:
To %1s, 

Please see attached for meeting minutes for all day meeting %2s held on %3s.

Sincerely,
%4s

message.name: ISSUE_MINUTES_ATTACHMENT_NAME_NO_TYPE
message.locale: Minutes for Meeting held on %1s.pdf

message.name: ISSUE_MINUTES_ATTACHMENT_NAME_TYPE_GIVEN
message.locale: Minutes for %1s held on %2s.pdf

message.name: GENERATE_MINUTES_FILE_NAME
message.locale: MeetingMinutes.pdf

message.name: ERR_ISSUE_MINUTES_NO_ATTENDEES_SELECTED
message.locale: The minutes cannot be issued as no attendees have been selected.

message.name: ERR_ISSUE_MINUTES_PROBLEM_WITH_FILE_ATTACHMENT
message.locale: Error processing attachments for minutes issued to %1s at %2s

message.name: INF_ISSUE_MINUTES_NOT_ISSUED
message.locale: Meeting minutes were not issued to the selected invitee(s) as the system administrator specified not to issue meeting minutes.

message.name: ERR_READING_CONCERN_ROLE_NAME
message.locale: Error reading full name for concern role.

message.name: ERR_READING_USER_FULL_NAME
message.locale: Error reading full name for user.

message.name: ERR_MEETING_ACTION_CLOSED
message.locale: This meeting action is closed so cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CURRENT_USER_NOT_ACTION_CREATOR
message.locale: Only the action creator may modify the meeting action.

message.name: ERR_PARSING_ACTION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Error parsing the meeting action subject.

message.name: ERR_TRANSFORMING_ACTION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Error transforming the meeting action subject.
